## FadingFeature.fadeFar property

Distance to the camera (range: `[0.0, 1.0]`<!-- -->) from which the objects are transparent. A value of &lt;<!-- -->= 0.0 disables fading.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fadeFar?: number;
```
